text: Hi, I'm looking to integrate HubSpot with an external service and call an external rest api and use the result on the page. to take an example: if I create a new landing page type product (not clear how to identify the page as a product yet), I want to call our external product tool (say shopify) with the name of the page/name of the product, get a bunch of data from the external service (the price, availability, description...) and add in the content of the page
I haven't seen a webhook on landing page, does it exist?
